full_summary:
=================
### Tender Announcement for Learning Services

**Reference Number:** PW-__ZH-113-41161
**Publication Date:** September 29, 2022
**Tender Closing Date:** November 25, 2022, 2:00 PM Eastern Standard Time
**Contracting Entity:** Public Works and Government Services Canada

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP) for the provision of Learning Services (LS) for federal government departments and crown corporations.

**Trade Agreements Affected:**
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement

**Subject of Requirement:**
The solicitation is a Request for Supply Arrangement (RFSA) to meet Canada’s requirements for Learning Services (LS) to be delivered in various locations across Canada. The scope includes the provision of learning services for federal government departments and crown corporations.

**Security Requirements:**
A Security Requirement is associated with the services provided under this contract. Bidders must be aware of the security requirements outlined in the Solicitation Documents.

**Set-Aside Program for Aboriginal Business:**
Part of this procurement may be designated as a Set-Aside Program for Aboriginal Business under the Procurement Strategy for Aboriginal Business (PSAB). In these cases, bidders must meet the requirements outlined in the PSAB.

**Official Languages:**
The services to be provided will be delivered in one or both of Canada’s official languages, as required by the Identified User.

**Submission Requirements:**
All suppliers interested in responding to this solicitation must:

* Enroll and establish an account in the Supplier Module of the Public Works and Government Services Canada Centralized Professional Services System (CPSS) ePortal
* Submit a bid through the CPSS ePortal by the designated closing date and time
* Submit supporting documentation via email as required by Canada

**Contact Information:**
For any inquiries or communications related to this solicitation, please contact:
* Diane Reynolds (zh)
* Public Works and Government Services Canada
* Terrasses de la Chaudière, 5th Floor
* 10 Wellington Street
* Gatineau, QC
* K1
